title: Ontology Construction Workshop for Comparative Analysis of Instructional Design Theories

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Aims to analyze instructional design theories applicable to science curricula, utilizing online collaboration tools in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can classify five or more major instructional design theories into ontology categories.
Learners can compare conceptual differences between theories and apply them to science lesson design.
Learners can complete the ontology-building process with peer learners using LMS-based collaborative tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
